Kāladīghavāpi：A lake，evidently in Ceylon．Cūlapintlapātika-Tissa saw an elephant’s corpse floating in the lake and made it his subject of meditation for arahantship．Vsm．i．191．



There was evidently a vihāra attached to it．The Majjhima Commentary （Ma．i．353f） gives a story of a novice who lived there．
